main event: Numerous observers, including police and civilians, reported seeing disk-like objects flying over Portland, Oregon on July 4, 1947.
interesting points: Eight law enforcement officers and a United Airlines crew reported sighting flying disks,. The disks changed direction abruptly and appeared round with no visible means of propulsion,. One witness described the disks as looking like shiny chromium hubcaps,. Several other witnesses reported seeing multiple objects, with sightings corroborated by citizens and coast guardsmen in nearby areas,. Reports included a photograph taken by a coast guardsman near Seattle, although the photographs were not included in the document.
witness description: police officers, a United Airlines crew, and private citizens
